channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- Bitdefender Engines
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitdefender -- Bitdefender Engines

item.title: CVE-2020-8100|2024-09-16T20:43:36.252Z -- bitdefender -- bitdefender%20engines
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the cevakrnl.rv0 module as used in the Bitdefender Engines allows an attacker to trigger a denial of service while scanning a specially-crafted sample. This issue affects: Bitdefender Bitdefender Engines versions prior to 7.84063.
